creator: Grandin, Vital-Justin, 1829-1902. (author)
description: Grandin, Vital-Justin: 1829-1902. Catholic clergyman; member of O.M.I.; from France to the mission on Lake Athabasca, 1855; chosen as Bishop Taché's coadjutor to assist in administration of the large diocese of St Boniface, 1857; vicar of the Saskatchewan missions, 1867; appointed first bishop of the diocese of St Albert, 1871 (Morice, Histoire de l'église catholique).
subject: The Spiritual Life--Roman Catholic Church
Canada--Politics and government
Roman Catholic Church--Clergy
title: Un suprême appel: l'évêque du nord-ouest supplie tous les amis de la justice au Canada de l'aider à protéger ses ouailles contre les tyrans d'Ottawa
